\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{tabularkv}

\begin{document}
\fbox{%
  \begin{tabularkv}[
    width=4in,
    height=1in,
    valign=center
  ]{@{}l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r@{}}
    upper left corner & upper right corner\\
    \noalign{\vfill}%
    \multicolumn{2}{@{}c@{}}{bounding box}\\
    \noalign{\vfill}%
    lower left corner & lower right corner\\
  \end{tabularkv}%
}
\end{document}
\endinput
